name: Griff and the Blue Forest
description:
CONTROLS:

Left and right arrows - Move the character
Up arrow - Interact with objects
Down arrow - Use item
X - Jump (stomp enemies to kill them!)
Z - Shot
Esc - Pause
Space - Change between items

Caution with your magic, Griff! You have only 7 shots and, if they're over you will need to spend Pixie Dust to shot again!

ITEMS:

Heart: +1hp
Unicorn Horn: Instakill enemies
Gnome Hat: +1 Life
Four leaf clover: Temporary speed up and invincibility
Magic ball: +1 shot

And a secret item that will give you plenty of Pixie Dust! Did you find it? Comment below!

----

"When I was a young and mischievous gnome, learning the fundamentals of magic still, I got in the human world, for a very curious ritual called "The Halloween". All human houses give you sweet treats if you say the magic words and scaring someone is an acceptable behavior in that ritual, and so I did.

After getting a ton of sweets, I scared a little girl with funny hair. It was hillarious! But when I was ready to get home, setting the portal, she scared me back and... well... The portal lead us both to Gnomotopia, my home.

Even though she was very young, for some reason, she was not scared! But when I found out that to take her back home we would have to go through the blue forest... I was the one who shivering all over..."
